description:
Value meets variety. With virtually everything except the plywood, the PU Mega Pack is a great way to start your home wall. The hold selection varies from kit to kit (embrace the surprise), with each one including a balanced blend of big, medium and small holds, screw-on hand and foot holds, micro bolt-on crimpers, really big roof jugs, and positive little juglets.

  • Includes 40 holds (no choice available)
  • Bolts, self-drilling screws, T-nuts and wrenches included
  • Guide on how to build a home wall included
name: Metolius PU Mega Pack 40
